vlive.korean: "어때요 우뿌라 DJ들 저 좀 심각한 고민이지 않나요?" "What do you think? Isn't this a serious problem?" 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 많이 기다리셨죠? 우주뿌셔라디오❣
vlive.english: "What do you think? Isn't this a serious problem?"

examples.korean: children suffering from a serious nutrient deficiency 발음듣기 심각한 영양 결핍증[실조]에 걸린 아동들 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: children suffering from a serious nutrient deficiency 발음

examples.korean: Minor toxicities of this drug include nausea and vomiting. 발음듣기 이 약물의 덜 심각한 독성 효과로는 메스꺼움과 구토가 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Minor toxicities of this drug include nausea and vomiting. 발음

examples.korean: The candidate was seriously damaged by the sleaze factor. 발음듣기 그 후보자는 부도덕성[부패] 요소 때문에 심각한 손상을 입었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The candidate was seriously damaged by the sleaze factor. 발음

examples.korean: Observers have reported serious violations of the ceasefire. 발음듣기 관측가들로부터 심각한 휴전 위반 사례들이 보고되어 왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Observers have reported serious violations of the ceasefire. 발음

examples.korean: These policies could cause severe economic and social dislocation. 발음듣기 이들 정책이 심각한 경제적, 사회적 혼란을 초래할 수도 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: These policies could cause severe economic and social dislocation. 발음
